20101223023547.000|20101223023548.000|CC1|SESSION A SEASON OF PROGRESS    
20101223023548.000|20101223023550.000|CC1|THAT'S CONFOUNDED HIS CRITICS.  
20101223023550.000|20101223023552.000|CC1|>> IF THERE'S ANY LESSONS TO    
20101223023552.000|20101223023553.000|CC1|DRAW FROM THESE PAST FEW WEEKS, 
20101223023553.000|20101223023556.000|CC1|IT'S THAT WE ARE NOT DOOMED TO  
20101223023556.000|20101223023559.000|CC1|ENDLESS GRID LOCK.              
20101223023559.000|20101223023600.000|CC1|WE'VE SHOWN IN THE WAKE OF THE  
20101223023600.000|20101223023602.000|CC1|NOVEMBER ELECTIONS THAT WE HAVE

20101223024159.000|20101223024159.000|CC1|THEY HAVE TAKEN STEPS TO CORRECT
20101223024159.000|20101223024200.000|CC1|THAT NOW.                       
20101223024200.000|20101223024201.000|CC1|AND IF THAT HAPPENS AGAIN, I'M  
20101223024201.000|20101223024205.000|CC1|SURE THAT HE IS GOING TO BE     
20101223024205.000|20101223024209.000|CC1|AWARE AS FAR AS THE TAKE DOWN   
20101223024209.000|20101223024211.000|CC1|OVERSEAS.                       
20101223024211.000|20101223024409.000|SEG|Type=Story
20101223024211.000|20101223024211.000|CC1|>>> A CATHOLIC BISHOP IS TAKING 
20101223024211.000|20101223024212.000|CC1|AIM AT ST. JOSEPH'S HOSPITAL IN 
20101223024212.000|20101223024213.000|CC1|ARIZONA, INSISTING IT CANNOT

20101223024243.000|20101223024246.000|CC1|EXCOMMUNICATED McBRIDE.

20101223024704.000|20101223024713.000|CC1|>>> OUR HEALTH AND MEDICAL      
20101223024713.000|20101223024714.000|CC1|EDITOR DR. RICHARD BESSER HAS   
20101223024714.000|20101223024715.000|CC1|UNCOVERED NEW DETAILS ABOUT A   
20101223024715.000|20101223024715.000|CC1|SERIOUS PROBLEM IN OUR HEALTH   
20101223024715.000|20101223024717.000|CC1|CARE SYSTEM.                    
20101223024717.000|20101223024720.000|CC1|AN UNPRECEDENTED SHORTAGE OF    
20101223024720.000|20101223024721.000|CC1|DRUGS, EVERYTHING FROM LIFE     
20101223024721.000|20101223024723.000|CC1|EXTENDING CANCER TREATMENTS TO  
20101223024723.000|20101223024725.000|CC1|MEDICATIONS ROUTINELY           
20101223024725.000|20101223024726.000|CC1|ADMINISTERED IN EMERGENCY ROOMS.
20101223024726.000|20101223024727.000|CC1|AND RICHARD'S FOUND THAT THOSE  
20101223024727.000|20101223024728.000|CC1|SHORTAGES MAY BE COMPROMISING   
20101223024728.000|20101223024729.000|CC1|PATIENT CARE.                   
20101223024729.000|20101223024730.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THIS YEAR, A       
20101223024730.000|20101223024734.000|CC1|NATIONWIDE SHORTAGE OF OVER 100 
20101223024734.000|20101223024738.000|CC1|CRITICAL MEDICATIONS USED FOR   
20101223024738.000|20101223024740.000|CC1|EDGE EVERYTHING FROM ANESTHESIA 
20101223024740.000|20101223024741.000|CC1|TO ASTHMA.                      
20101223024741.000|20101223024742.000|CC1|>> THIS IS THE FIRST TIME I'VE  
20101223024742.000|20101223024743.000|CC1|ENCOUNTERED SHORTAGES THAT MAY  
20101223024743.000|20101223024744.000|CC1|AFFECT PATIENT CARE.            
20101223024744.000|20101223024744.000|CC1|IT'S A HUGE PROBLEM.            
20101223024744.000|20101223024745.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ONE DRUG           
20101223024745.000|20101223024746.000|CC1|AFFECTED --                     
20101223024746.000|20101223024747.000|CC1|DOXORUBICIN.                    
20101223024747.000|20101223024749.000|CC1|AN ESSENTIAL CHEMOTHERAPY DRUG. 
20101223024749.000|20101223024749.000|CC1|HALF A MILLION DOSES WERE NEEDED
20101223024749.000|20101223024751.000|CC1|LAST YEAR.                      
20101223024751.000|20101223024753.000|CC1|IT'S THE ONLY DRUG THAT WORKED  
20101223024753.000|20101223024756.000|CC1|ON MARK McKEE'S TUMOR.          
20101223024756.000|20101223024757.000|CC1|>> THE HOSPITAL ACTUALLY CALLED 
20101223024757.000|20101223024758.000|CC1|US ON A SUNDAY NIGHT AND SAID   
20101223024758.000|20101223024759.000|CC1|WELL, DON'T COME IN.            
20101223024759.000|20101223024800.000|CC1|WE MIGHT NOT HAVE THE DRUG.     
20101223024800.000|20101223024801.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WE HEARD FROM      
20101223024801.000|20101223024802.000|CC1|DOCTORS ACROSS THE COUNTRY      
20101223024802.000|20101223024803.000|CC1|STRUGGLING WITH SO MUCH         
20101223024803.000|20101223024805.000|CC1|UNCERTAINTY.                    
20101223024805.000|20101223024808.000|CC1|>> WE NEED TO BE ABLE TO GIVE   
20101223024808.000|20101223024811.000|CC1|PATIENTS AT LEAST A GENERAL IDEA
20101223024811.000|20101223024812.000|CC1|HOW LONG A GIVEN DRUG IS GOING  
20101223024812.000|20101223024814.000|CC1|TO BE IN SHORT SUPPLY.          
20101223024814.000|20101223024815.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THERE ARE THREE    
20101223024815.000|20101223024817.000|CC1|COMPANIES THAT MAKE DOXORUBICIN.
20101223024817.000|20101223024818.000|CC1|TWO SLOWED OR STOPPED PRODUCTION
20101223024818.000|20101223024820.000|CC1|THIS YEAR.                      
20101223024820.000|20101223024823.000|CC1|IT IS TYPICAL OF DRUG SHORTAGES,
20101223024823.000|20101223024824.000|CC1|WHEN COMPANIES STOP MAKING A    
20101223024824.000|20101223024825.000|CC1|DRUG BECAUSE OF LOW PROFITS OR  
20101223024825.000|20101223024826.000|CC1|PROBLEMS AT THE PLANT.          
20101223024826.000|20101223024828.000|CC1|PHARMACY SUPPLIES RUN OUT.      
20101223024828.000|20101223024829.000|CC1|THE FDA IS RESPONSIBLE FOR      
20101223024829.000|20101223024831.000|CC1|TRACKING DRUG SHORTAGES.        
20101223024831.000|20101223024833.000|CC1|WE'RE NOT TALKING ABOUT         
20101223024833.000|20101223024835.000|CC1|ANTIBIOTIC FOR AN EAR INFECTION.
20101223024835.000|20101223024837.000|CC1|WE'RE TALKING ABOUT REALLY      
20101223024837.000|20101223024837.000|CC1|IMPORTANT MEDICATIONS.          
20101223024837.000|20101223024838.000|CC1|>> THAT'S RIGHT.                
20101223024838.000|20101223024839.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHAT TYPE OF DRUGS 
20101223024839.000|20101223024840.000|CC1|ARE SEEING IN SHORT SUPPLY?     
20101223024840.000|20101223024842.000|CC1|>> DRUGS THAT ARE NEEDED FOR    
20101223024842.000|20101223024845.000|CC1|PATIENTS UNDERGOING SURGERY.    
20101223024845.000|20101223024846.000|CC1|EMERGENCY MEDICINE DRUGS LIKE   
20101223024846.000|20101223024847.000|CC1|DRUGS ON THE CRASH CART.        
20101223024847.000|20101223024848.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DRUGS ON THE CRASH 
20101223024848.000|20101223024848.000|CC1|CART?                           
20101223024848.000|20101223024850.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101223024850.000|20101223024851.000|CC1|THOSE SHORTAGES HAVE RESOLVED.  
20101223024851.000|20101223024852.000|CC1|THOSE WERE VERY CRITICAL.       
20101223024852.000|20101223024854.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT THESE ARE      
20101223024854.000|20101223024855.000|CC1|PRIVATE COMPANIES, AND THE FDA  
20101223024855.000|20101223024857.000|CC1|CAN ONLY ADVISE AND LOOK FOR    
20101223024857.000|20101223024857.000|CC1|OTHER SUPPLIERS.                
20101223024857.000|20101223024859.000|CC1|WHEN DOCTORS NEED TO SUBSTITUTE,
20101223024859.000|20101223024900.000|CC1|OTHER MEDICINES MAY NOT BE AS

20101223025533.000|20101223025534.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101223025534.000|20101223025534.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101223025534.000|20101223025537.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101223025537.000|20101223025539.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101223025539.000|20101223025539.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101223025539.000|20101223025541.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101223025541.000|20101223025541.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101223025541.000|20101223025544.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101223025544.000|20101223025544.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101223025544.000|20101223025546.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101223025546.000|20101223025546.000|CC1|        working together        
20101223025546.000|20101223025548.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101223025548.000|20101223025548.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101223025548.000|20101223025551.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101223025551.000|20101223025551.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101223025551.000|20101223025553.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101223025553.000|20101223025555.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101223025555.000|20101223025555.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101223025555.000|20101223025557.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101223025557.000|20101223025557.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase      
20101223025557.000|20101223025559.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis   
20101223025559.000|20101223025601.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20101223025601.000|20101223025601.000|CC1|        Tell your doctor        
20101223025601.000|20101223025603.000|CC1|  if you have a heart condition 
20101223025603.000|20101223025603.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20101223025603.000|20101223025605.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.     
20101223025605.000|20101223025606.000|CC1|    I had fun today, Grandpa.   
20101223025606.000|20101223025609.000|CC1|                You and me both.
20101223025609.000|20101223025609.000|CC1|   If COPD is still making it   
20101223025609.000|20101223025611.000|CC1|        hard to breathe,        
20101223025611.000|20101223025611.000|CC1|         ask your doctor        
20101223025611.000|20101223025613.000|CC1|       if including ADVAIR      
20101223025613.000|20101223025613.000|CC1|   will help improve your lung  
20101223025613.000|20101223025616.000|CC1| function for better breathing. 
20101223025616.000|20101223025616.000|CC1|         Get your first         
20101223025616.000|20101223025618.000|CC1|     full prescription free     
20101223025618.000|20101223025620.000|CC1|      and save on refills.
